EDUCATION.Institute Name: Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Portfolio Website Created Using Simple Html/css.
Django Web Framework Is Used.
Materialize Css Is Used.
The Site Is Hosted At Heroku At :
port-bhal.herokuapp.com

A simple blog application created using django as backend.
Bootstrap 4 ready made template for blog is used.
Django allauth is used for authorization purposes.
Tinymce editor is used to edit the blog the interface provides for the most recent blogs to be viewed.
Only authorized users can access and edit/Upload their respective blogs.
Every blog has a view count as well as comment count separate page for each blog.

This is a simple echo bot created using python. Telegram has been used to create a bot. Python-telegram library has been used to bring the echo bot to life. It simply returns whatever the user types.
Echo Bot Has Been Deployed As A Polling Program(Basic Of Polling Process Has Been Followed In Deploying It)

Python is used for deploying fully conversational bot for telegram.
Python telegram library is used.
This conversational bot has the capability to fetch news items of various types from various countries and various languages.
The following are the specifications of the project:
1.Setting up of webhook for telegram bot using Flask web framework.
2.Created a conversational agent for bot using DialogFlow.
3.This makes it up for a simple news bot.
4.Setting up custom keyboard for the news bot using ReplyKeyboardMarkup Class of python telegram library.
5.Flask App has been deployed on Heroku Cloud Services
